crystal_longsword.name: Crystal Longsword
crystal_longsword.description: 3 charges, regains 1d3 daily at dawn. Expend 1 charge to regain HP equal to extra radiant damage dealt.

sentinel_shield.name: Sentinel Shield
sentinel_shield.description: Advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks

light.name: Light
light.description: Touch object to shed bright light in 20-foot radius

protection_from_evil_and_good.name: Protection from Evil and Good
protection_from_evil_and_good.description: Protects against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Ward creature against attack, attackers must make Wisdom save

lesser_restoration.name: Lesser Restoration
lesser_restoration.description: End one disease or condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, poisoned)

aid.name: Aid
aid.description: Up to 3 creatures gain 5 temporary HP and increase HP maximum

find_steed.name: Find Steed
find_steed.description: Summon celestial, fey, or fiend spirit as mount

dispel_magic.name: Dispel Magic
dispel_magic.description: End spells of 3rd level or lower, roll for higher level spells

remove_curse.name: Remove Curse
remove_curse.description: End all curses on creature or object

revivify.name: Revivify
revivify.description: Return creature to life that died within last minute

beacon_of_hope.name: Beacon of Hope
beacon_of_hope.description: Creatures have advantage on Wisdom saves and death saves, regain max HP from healing

sacred_weapon.name: Sacred Weapon
sacred_weapon.description: +3 to attack rolls, weapon sheds light, 1 minute duration

turn_the_unholy.name: Turn the Unholy
turn_the_unholy.description: Fiends and undead within 30ft must make Wisdom save or be turned

lay_on_hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay_on_hands.description: Heal HP or cure disease/poison (5 HP per disease/poison)

divine_sense.name: Divine Sense
divine_sense.description: Detect celestials, fiends, undead within 60ft as action

radiant_soul.name: Radiant Soul
radiant_soul.description: Bonus action: gain 30ft fly speed, +4 radiant damage once per turn

aura_of_protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura_of_protection.description: +4 to saving throws for you and allies within 10ft

aura_of_courage.name: Aura of Courage
aura_of_courage.description: You and allies within 10ft can't be frightened

aura_of_devotion.name: Aura of Devotion
aura_of_devotion.description: You and allies within 10ft can't be charmed

divine_smite.name: Divine Smite
divine_smite.description: Expend spell slot for +2d8 to 5d8 radiant damage on melee hit

improved_divine_smite.name: Improved Divine Smite
improved_divine_smite.description: All melee weapon hits deal +1d8 radiant damage
